text: (Believe in Allah) O people of Mecca (and His messenger) Muhammad (pbuh) (and spend of that whereof He hath made you trustees) and spend in the way of Allah of that which He has made you owners; (and such of you as believe) O people of Mecca (and spend (aright)) and spend their wealth in the way of Allah, (theirs will be a great reward) in the Garden because of their faith and spending of their wealth.
